line_item_id.description: The ID of this generated amortization schedule.

cycle_exclusive_end.description: The date-time the am cycle ends.

min_pay_due_at.description: The date the minimum payment for the am schedule is due.

am_min_pay_cents.description: The amount due just for the am schedule. This accounts for principal, interest, and deferred interest balance but does not include fees.

am_cycle_payment_cents.description: The amount in cents that was actually paid towards the loan during the billing cycle

am_interest_cents.description: The amount in cents allocated to interest from this am payment

am_deferred_cents.description: The amount in cents allocated to deferred interest from this am payment

am_principal_cents.description: The amount in cents allocated to principal from this am payment

am_start_principal_balance_cents.description: The starting principal balance on the loan before this payment

am_end_principal_balance_cents.description: The ending principal balance on the loan after this payment

am_start_total_balance_cents.description: The starting balance on the loan before this payment

am_end_total_balance_cents.description: The ending balance on the loan after this payment

paid_on_time.description: Indicates whether the amount for this am payment was paid on time; only present if the date scheduled for the am payment has passed as of the time of the request.
